[00:04.50]Because it's the last ride ever gonna that I'm ever gonna take at Astroworld
[00:08.31]
[00:18.77]Woah woah yeah yeah yeah
[00:22.06]Look at your Rollie uh look at my Rollie uh
[00:25.01]That's a small face uh this a big face uh
[00:28.10]She can't see my room f**k her in the hallway
[00:31.11]Gettin' bored with this money count it all day
[00:33.84]Yeah they thought we were soft boy you learned the hard way
[00:37.26]Not with all the talkin' turned it to a closed case
[00:39.97]Look bullets got duller and it's vanilla all white that Plain Jane yeah
[00:43.34]The Rolls goin' better hundred or better
[00:44.88]I took the money and flooded my bezel
[00:46.40]You diamond to rock computed the setting
[00:47.87]VVS diamonds they pop just like kettle
[00:49.61]I popped a molly to get on my level
[00:51.10]Rockin' that Ricky and Raf here my sweater
[00:52.58]Yeah Patek Philippe it cloudy like Heaven
[00:54.10]Met her at 10 f**ked that girl at 11
[00:55.69]Fake diamonds in your Rollie how you reckon
[00:57.17]Diamond tester n**ga you better check it yeah
[00:58.75]Look at your Rollie uh look at my Rollie uh
[01:01.77]That's a small face uh this a big face uh
[01:04.76]She can't see my room f**k her in the hallway yeah
[01:07.80]Gettin' bored with this money count it all day
[01:10.43]On the south side of town gettin' me a bald fade
[01:13.40]
[01:13.91]Pass her some stuff we can down it all take it's lit
[01:17.10]No can't trust her she gon' leave us all laced laced
[01:20.07]Bust a bankroll in the club where's Chase yeah yeah yeah
[01:23.09]Like woah yeah yeah alright
[01:26.12]Yeah they really want my soul yeah
[01:27.77]That can never go straight up
[01:29.25]Angel in the snow what
[01:30.73]Always leave me cold iced
[01:32.18]Leave it on the floor what
[01:33.72]She slidin' from the pole like woah yeah yeah yeah
[01:38.34]Put it on speed
[01:39.10]
[01:40.10]You in ivory is all I need skrrt
[01:42.32]All agree we gon' skip the tees go bare like trees trees
[01:45.20]It's stuck in heat we go with the dawgs and then we flee
[01:47.76]
[01:48.29]Way this summer goin' I might start my summer leave
[01:50.85]
[01:51.37]Every young n**ga get a check and get a team
[01:54.09]Yeah man's on the front line 'cause man's on his deen
[01:57.15]No small faces it's just an AP beamin'
[02:00.10]Look at your Rollie uh look at my Rollie uh
[02:02.87]That's a small face uh this a big face uh
[02:05.87]She can't see my room f**k her in the hallway yeah
[02:08.89]Gettin' bored with this money count it all day
[02:11.95]Look at my Rollie look at your Rollie
[02:14.21]
[02:14.94]Your sh*t rockless my sh*t hockey goalie
[02:17.75]You should gon' hide it man it's too bad
[02:20.27]
[02:20.78]Like a bald n**ga still wearin' du-rags ha
[02:24.31]Israeli guards boy please be mindful
[02:27.35]Don't have words with me 'cause I got a mind full
[02:30.41]I could tell Larry David was the mind behind Seinfeld
[02:33.45]Wanna know how I feel Step into my minefield
[02:36.52]Wanna know how pain feels I got off my main pills
[02:39.55]Bet my wifey stay close she know I'm on my Bezos
[02:42.58]Opioid addiction pharmacy's the real trap
[02:45.68]Sometimes I feel trapped Jordan with no Phil Jack
[02:48.76]One year it's Illuminati next year it's the Sunken Place
[02:51.97]They don't want me to change nah n**ga run in place
[02:54.82]I need someone else to make this drink because

data.trans:
[ti:Watch]
[ar:Travis Scott/Kanye West/Lil Uzi Vert]
[al:Watch]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:02.25]//
[00:04.50]这是我最后一次来这儿玩了
[00:08.31]
[00:18.77]//
[00:22.06]看看你的劳力士 再跟我比较比较
[00:25.01]你的小 我的大
[00:28.10]我等不及进到卧室 就要跟她云雨
[00:31.11]天天数钱数得心烦
[00:33.84]你认为我们不堪一击 那就让你瞧瞧我们的本事
[00:37.26]废话少说 让我把事情一次性解决好了
[00:39.97]我的子弹头都是奢侈品 就像我手腕上这块表 即便没钻也闪瞎眼
[00:43.34]开着劳斯莱斯横冲直撞
[00:44.88]我挣到钱 就给车里镶上钻
[00:46.40]你那种钻石不过是廉价货
[00:47.87]我的钻石 剔透无比
[00:49.61]让我享受一番 进入迷幻状态
[00:51.10]只穿Ricky和RAF牌子的衣服
[00:52.58]戴着百达翡丽 在天堂随性畅游
[00:54.10]十点才跟她会面 十一点就翻云覆雨
[00:55.69]表上镶的都是假钻 你也好意思出来显摆
[00:57.17]劝你赶紧去鉴定一下吧
[00:58.75]看看你的劳力士 再跟我比较比较
[01:01.77]你的小 我的大
[01:04.76]我等不及进到卧室 就要跟她云雨
[01:07.80]天天数钱数得心烦
[01:10.43]我在休斯敦南部 体验极致享受
[01:13.40]
[01:13.91]让她跟我享受一番吞云吐雾的快感
[01:17.10]不能相信她 她会把我置于死地
[01:20.07]在夜店里肆意挥霍 我们腰缠万贯
[01:23.09]这感觉太爽了
[01:26.12]他们都想夺走我的灵魂
[01:27.77]但他们绝不会得逞
[01:29.25]她是一个肌肤胜雪的美女
[01:30.73]总是对我冷若冰霜
[01:32.18]把衣服扔到地上吧
[01:33.72]看她表演绝技
[01:38.34]加快速度
[01:39.10]
[01:40.10]我只需要你和**给我带来欢愉
[01:42.32]没问题 让我们享受一番
[01:45.20]战况告急 我和兄弟们并肩作战
[01:47.76]
[01:48.29]今年这个夏天是如此开心 让我期待着下一个夏天的精彩
[01:50.85]
[01:51.37]年轻人一有钱 身边就一堆兄弟
[01:54.09]我在一线奋斗 因为音乐是我的信仰
[01:57.15]我的钻石腕表闪亮无比
[02:00.10]看看你的劳力士 再跟我比较比较
[02:02.87]你的小 我的大
[02:05.87]我等不及进到卧室 就要跟她云雨
[02:08.89]天天数钱数得心烦
[02:11.95]看看你的劳力士 再跟我比较比较
[02:14.21]
[02:14.94]你的表上一颗钻都没有
[02:17.75]你还是别拿出来丢人现眼了
[02:20.27]
[02:20.78]这不过更显得欲盖弥彰而已
[02:24.31]保镖都是以色列人 兄弟你可小心点
[02:27.35]别想找我麻烦 对付你小菜一碟
[02:30.41]我知道你有后台
[02:33.45]想知道我的感受吗 来挑战我一下试试
[02:36.52]想知道我有多痛苦吗 我好久都没吃药了
[02:39.55]我的太太助我成功
[02:42.58]我不会再被**所控制
[02:45.68]有时我感觉身陷困境 就像没有了禅师的乔丹
[02:48.76]为黑帮服务一年 你就会坠入深渊
[02:51.97]他们不想让我改变 只想守住自己的领域
[02:54.82]我需要别人为我调酒
[02:57.91]你不明白我的口味
[03:00.97]喝得太尽兴 猜猜怎么着
[03:04.04]永远不要相信不喝酒的那些人
[03:07.16]
[03:09.29]我拥有最好的劳力士腕表
[03:12.46]
[03:13.60]我告诉他 我也想要最顶级的美女
